trait.name: Snail Trail
entries: When the nomollusk moves through a space, it fills the space with contaminated mucus that remains for 10 minutes. A creature that ends its turn in the mucus is covered in goop and subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the Slowed condition. Each time the creature ends its turn with the Slowed condition, it gains a Contamination level. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to clean away the goop, ending the Slowed condition.

action.name: Slobber
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage.

action.name: Creep
entries: The nomollusk moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} and can enter the spaces of Large or smaller creatures as it does. Each creature whose space it enters is subjected once to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is pushed 5 feet away from the nomollusk into a space of its choice. If the target chooses not to move, it suffers the effects of a failure. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition and is subjected to Snail Trail.

reaction.name: Shell Reflection
entries: {@actTrigger} The nomollusk takes damage from a spell or magical attack. {@actResponse} The attacker takes Radiant damage equal to the triggering damage and causes an Arcane Anomaly.

monster.name: Arcane Wraith
languages: The languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arcane wraith casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The arcane wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arcane wraith makes three Comet Shard attacks.

action.name: Comet Shard
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) Force damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the arcane wraith.

action.name: Nightmare Pattern {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cube [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cube} centered on a point the arcane wraith can see. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition (save ends). While {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, the target has the Immobilized condition. The effect ends for the target if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it out of its nightmare. When the effect ends, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beetle knight makes two Scything Arm-Blade attacks.

action.name: Scything Arm-Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 10 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Pincer Horn
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Piercing damage, or 26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) Piercing damage if the beetle knight moved 20 or more feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit. If the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 14}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the beetle knight can't use its Pincer Horn against another target.

bonus.name: Fling
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 14}, one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the beetle knight. {@actSaveFail} The target is thrown up to {@dice 1d6 × 10} feet, landing with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the target strikes a solid surface, it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

reaction.name: Carapace Parry
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the beetle knight can see hits it with an attack. {@actResponse} The beetle knight adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The belfray doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The belfray has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The belfray makes two Claws attacks and one Bite attack. It can replace its Bite with Sonic Blast, if available.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the Enfeebled condition until the end of the belfray's next turn. The belfray regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the damage dealt by its Bite.

action.name: Sonic Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the belfray that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) Thunder damage, and the target has the Weakened condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} or {@variantrule Darkness|XPHB}, the belfray takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If Big Linda is destroyed and her corpse is left within an area of the Deep Haze for 1 hour, she is revived with all of her {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: When Big Linda starts her turn in an area of the Deep Haze, she regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Big Linda dies only if she starts her turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Big Linda makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 19}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and Big Linda can't Bite another target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 10 ft. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Acid Spew {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 63 ({@damage 14d8}) Acid damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Insect Swarm
entries: The bloated hive emits a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of buzzing insects. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Disrupt the Hive
entries: When the bloated hive dies, it immediately spawns a Swarm of Contaminated Insects in its space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bloated hive makes two attacks.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Spawn Swarm {@recharge 5}
entries: The bloated hive creates a Swarm of Contaminated Insects, which appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet. The swarm takes its turn immediately after the bloated hive.

bonus.name: Distracting Swarm
entries: The bloated hive causes its Insect Swarm to fly in the face of a creature within 5 feet of it. The target can't take Reactions until the end of the bloated hive's turn.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Contaminated Bites
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 0 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, or 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Necrotic damage if the swarm has the {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} condition. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The bojack can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the bojack remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal animal corpse.

trait.name: Sudden Death
entries: Creatures that haven't yet taken a turn in combat are Helpless against attacks made by the bojack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bojack makes two attacks, using Impaling Limbs or Corrosive Mucus in any combination.

action.name: Impaling Limbs
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target is Bleeding ({@dice 2d6}). While Bleeding in this way, the target is also Slowed.

action.name: Corrosive Mucus
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 30/60 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4}) Acid damage, and the target is {@hazard Burning|XPHB} ({@dice 2d4} Acid). While {@hazard Burning|XPHB} in this way, the target's AC becomes 10 + its Dexterity modifier.

bonus.name: Predatory Cunning
entries: The bojack takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: As long as the chitter has moved 20 or more feet this turn, it has a high jump and long jump of 30 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chitter makes two Sharpened Claws attacks and one Acrid Bite attack. It can also use Chitter, if available.

action.name: Acrid Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Sharpened Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Chitter {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}, each creature within 120 feet of the chitter that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Dazed condition until the end of the chitter's next turn.

bonus.name: Aggressive
entries: The chitter moves up to its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} toward a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature it can see. If it ends this movement adjacent to the creature, it gains {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against that creature until the end of its turn.

reaction.name: Slow Fall
entries: {@actTrigger} The chitter takes falling damage and doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition. {@actResponse} The triggering damage is reduced to 0.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The crater wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crater wurm makes a Bite attack, then makes Bite attacks against each creature adjacent to the first target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 14}, reach 10 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) Piercing damage, and if it is Large or smaller, the target is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 22}. {@actSaveFail} The target is swallowed by the wurm. The target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} against effects originating from outside the wurm, and takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns. A creature that takes this Necrotic damage must also succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or gain one Contamination level. If the wurm takes 30 or more damage on a single turn from a creature inside it, it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which land in spaces within 10 feet of the wurm with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature no longer has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and can escape from the corpse using 20 feet of movement, exiting with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Breach
entries: The wurm moves up to its speed, entering the spaces of Large or smaller creatures. Each creature whose space it enters is subjected once to the following effect. At the end of its movement, the wurm can make one Bite attack against a {@condition Prone|XPHB} creature as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}. {@actSave str} {@dc 22}. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is pushed 5 feet away from the wurm into a space of its choice. If the target chooses not to move, it suffers the effects of a failure. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet away from the wurm and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The dark growth can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) check.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The dark growth regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn. If the dark growth takes Fire or Radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the dark growth's next turn. The dark growth dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dark growth makes three attacks: two with its Entangling Vines and one with its Infection Spores.

action.name: Entangling Vines
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 30 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) Piercing damage, and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}) and the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition until the grapple ends.

action.name: Infection Spores
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 60 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target is infected with a disease called Dark Decay. Instead of acting normally on its turn, the target must move toward the closest creature that isn't infected with Dark Decay and make one melee attack against it. If the attack hits, the target of that attack must also make a saving throw against Dark Decay. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save. Subsequent Failures: The target gains one Contamination level. Third Success: The disease ends.

An infected creature that dies or undergoes a Monstrous Transformation becomes a Dark Growth Shambler. A {@spell Lesser Restoration|XPHB} spell or similar magic that removes diseases ends Dark Decay, as does any magic that removes Contamination levels.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dark growth shambler makes two Claw attacks and one Infectious Bite attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Infectious Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target is infected with a disease called Dark Decay. Instead of acting normally on its turn, the target must move toward the closest creature that isn't infected with Dark Decay and make one melee attack against it. If the attack hits, the target of that attack must also make a saving throw against Dark Decay. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save. Subsequent Failures: The target gains one Contamination level. Third Success: The disease ends.

An infected creature that dies or undergoes a Monstrous Transformation becomes a Dark Growth Shambler. A {@spell Lesser Restoration|XPHB} spell or similar magic that removes diseases ends Dark Decay, as does any magic that removes Contamination levels.

reaction.name: Abrupt Decay
entries: {@actTrigger} The dark growth shambler drops to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and it hasn't taken Fire damage this round. {@actResponse} The dark growth shambler creates a Dark Growth in its space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The digipede makes one Bite attack and two Talons attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) Slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) Lightning damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Shocked condition until the end of the digipede's next turn.

action.name: Eye Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line. {@actSaveFail} 35 ({@damage 10d6}) Lightning damage, and the target has the Slowed condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. {@actSaveFail 2} The target has the Immobilized condition. {@actSaveFail 3} The target has the {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Contaminated Regeneration
entries: The sewer gator regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn as long as it is in contaminated water. The gator dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Amphibious Lunge
entries: If the sewer gator swims 20 or more feet on its turn, it can long jump or high jump up to 60 feet. If it ends this jump within 5 feet of a creature, it has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on its next Crushing Bite attack against that creature, and that attack deals an additional 40 ({@damage 9d8}) Piercing damage.

trait.name: Predatory Stealth
entries: The sewer gator has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks to Hide in water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sewer gator makes two attacks. It can't make both a Crushing Bite attack and a Tail Strike attack against the same target.

action.name: Crushing Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 15 ft. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) Piercing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 19}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and the sewer gator can't use Crushing Bite against another target.

action.name: Tail Strike
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 15 ft. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 20 feet away from the sewer gator and has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Death Roll
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 11}, reach 15 ft., one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the sewer gator. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) Piercing damage. {@actSave str} {@dc 19}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Dazed and Helpless conditions until it escapes the sewer gator's grapple.

reaction.name: Submerge
entries: {@actTrigger} The sewer gator takes damage while in water. {@actResponse} The sewer gator swims half its speed and takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Invisible in Sludge
entries: The elemental has the {@condition Invisible|XPHB} condition while fully submerged in delerium sludge.

trait.name: Sludge Form
entries: The elemental can enter a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

action.name: Contaminated Touch
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level.

action.name: Engulf
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 15}, each Large or smaller creature in the elemental's space. {@actSaveSuccess} The target is pushed out of the elemental's space. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. The elemental can grapple one Large creature or two Medium or smaller creatures at a time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, the target takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Necrotic damage and is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can take an action to pull a creature or object out of it with a successful {@dc 15} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

trait.name: Enduring Flame
entries: Flames within 10 feet of the elemental can't be extinguished, and the {@hazard Burning|XPHB} condition can't end for creatures within 10 feet of the elemental.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 30-foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} in an additional 30 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes three Dancing Flame attacks.

action.name: Dancing Flame
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Fire damage, and the target has the {@hazard Burning|XPHB} condition ({@dice 3d6} Fire).

bonus.name: Flickerjump
entries: The elemental teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

trait.name: Fog Form
entries: The elemental can enter a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

trait.name: Deep Haze
entries: A creature that enters the same space as the elemental or starts its turn there is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one Contamination level.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The elemental explodes when it dies and it hasn't taken Force, Radiant, or Thunder damage since its last turn. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the elemental. {@actSaveFail} 42 ({@damage 12d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one Contamination level. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} The explosion triggers a random Arcane Anomaly (see Appendix C).

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two Shard Slam attacks.

action.name: Shard Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage, and the target gains one Contamination level.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The eldritch cataclysm can enter a {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

trait.name: Cyclonic Storm
entries: The eldritch cataclysm emits a 120-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of high winds that disperse gases and vapors and extinguish unprotected flames. Ranged attacks that pass through the area have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}. Objects that are not worn or carried are blown away {@dice 1d6 × 5} feet in a random direction. A creature that starts its turn in the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 17} (flying creatures have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} The target has the Slowed condition until the start of its next turn. Failure by 5 or more: The target is flung {@dice 1d6 × 5} feet in a random direction, landing with the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The eldritch cataclysm uses Chain Lightning or Icy Bolt, then uses Meteor Strike or Quake.

action.name: Chain Lightning
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 12}, range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) Lightning damage, the target has the Shocked condition until the end of the cataclysm's next turn, and the lightning leaps to another creature of the cataclysm's choice within 15 feet of the first target. The cataclysm makes a separate {@spell Chain Lightning|XPHB} attack against the target. The cataclysm can make any number of {@spell Chain Lightning|XPHB} attacks in this way, but a creature can be targeted only once each time the cataclysm takes this action.

action.name: Icy Bolt
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 12}, range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) Cold damage. {@hom}The target and each creature within 5 feet of it are subjected to the following effect. {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Cold damage, and the target has the Frozen condition ({@dc 17}).

action.name: Meteor Strike
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 15-foot radius, 40-foot-tall cylinder centered on a point the cataclysm can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Fire damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Quake
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the cataclysm. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Thunder damage, and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The graffiti casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The graffiti is incapacitated while in the area of antimagic. If targeted by {@spell Dispel Magic|XPHB}, the graffiti must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or become Unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The graffiti regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of each of its turns. If the graffiti is splashed with water, targeted by {@spell Prestidigitation|XPHB}, or takes Cold damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Its body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Solvent Susceptibility
entries: The graffiti is instantly destroyed by Universal Solvent.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The graffiti can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Surface Bound
entries: The graffiti can only move along contiguous flat surfaces, such as walls or floors.

action.name: Satire
entries: The graffiti shapes itself into a satirical representation of a foe. {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, one creature within 60 feet that can see the graffiti. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of the graffiti's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Transposition
entries: The air quivers around creatures near the graffiti. {@actSave cha} {@dc 15}, up to five creatures the graffiti can see within 120 feet. {@actSaveFail} The creature teleports to an unoccupied space capable of supporting the creature within 120 feet.

action.name: Summon Public Opinion {@recharge}
entries: The graffiti conjures a swarm of Drakkenheim citizen spirits within 120 feet of itself. The swarm uses the Chorus stat block. The chorus acts immediately after the graffiti on the same {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count, and it obeys the graffiti. The chorus disappears after 1 minute or the graffiti dies.

monster.name: Haze Husk
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) Bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Death Burst
entries: {@actTrigger} The haze husk is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} by damage that isn't Radiant or from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. {@actResponse d}{@actSave con} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the haze husk. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage. Failure by 5 or more: The target gains one Contamination level.

monster.name: Haze Wight
languages: The languages it knew in life

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The haze wight makes two Contaminated Blast attacks.

action.name: Contaminated Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Necrotic damage. The first time the target is hit by a Contaminated Blast each turn, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 13}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level.

bonus.name: Animate Haze Husk
entries: The haze wight reanimates the corpse of a haze husk it can see within 60 feet. The haze husk is revived with 5 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and immediately stands.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 3}, reach 5 ft. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

trait.name: Anchored
entries: The chrysalis is firmly anchored in place. It can't be forced to move or teleport unless it chooses to be.

trait.name: Haze Aura
entries: The chrysalis conjures Deep Haze in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}, which renders its area {@variantrule Lightly Obscured|XPHB}. A creature that starts its turn in the area is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Harden
entries: The chrysalis regains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, gaining any excess healing as {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

reaction.name: Sudden Emergence
entries: {@actTrigger} The chrysalis is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. {@actResponse} Roll {@dice 1d6}. On a 6, a Hazewing Moth Adult emerges from the chrysalis, sharing its {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} count. On a 1-5, vile goo spills out of the chrysalis, and each creature within 5 feet of it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage. If the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition, its Intelligence score is reduced by {@dice 1d4} until it finishes a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. The target dies if this effect reduces its Intelligence score to 0.

action.name: Delerium Dust {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the hazewing moth. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Radiant damage, and the target has the Addled condition (save ends).

bonus.name: Hypnotic Flutter
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of the hazewing moth that can see it (hazewing moths automatically succeed). {@actSaveFail} The target has the Slowed condition (save ends). If the target is already Slowed, it instead has the Immobilized condition (save ends). If the target is already Immobilized, it also has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition (save ends both).

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the eldritch blossom remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary flower.

action.name: Contaminated Touch
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 2}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level. If the target is {@condition Charmed|XPHB} by the eldritch blossom, it is hit automatically and has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on its save.

action.name: Hypnotic Pollen (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the eldritch blossom. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition for 1 minute. While {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition and must approach the eldritch blossom on its turns, taking the most direct path possible and moving through hazards. The effect ends early if a creature takes an action to shake the target out of its stupor.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: {@actTrigger} The eldritch blossom succeeds on its save against a spell that targets only the eldritch blossom and doesn't have an area of effect, or a spell attack misses the eldritch blossom. {@actResponse} The eldritch blossom chooses a creature it can see within 30 feet as the spell's new target (the original caster is a valid target). If the spell forces a saving throw, the new target makes its own save. If the spell has an attack roll, the original caster rerolls the attack against the new target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kronen makes two Claw attacks and uses Loathsome Presence.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Loathsome Presence
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each creature that can see the kronen. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition for 1 minute (save ends). If the creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, it is immune to the kronen's Loathsome Presence for 24 hours.

bonus.name: Scuttle
entries: The kronen takes the Dash action.

reaction.name: Infestation
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the kronen. {@actResponse d}{@actSave dex} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} The target is covered in cockroaches. It takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Piercing damage at the end of each of its turns until a creature takes an action to swipe the cockroaches off its body.

trait.name: Eternal Torment
entries: If a last memory dies, it reappears {@dice 1d4} days later, unleashing a howling scream that can be heard up to 300 feet away.

trait.name: Silhouette
entries: The last memory can only move along contiguous flat surfaces, such as walls or floors. It cannot fly or swim and must always be in contact with a surface. Additionally, the last memory ignores all natural {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} and can climb without making an ability check.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The last memory doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Sorrowful Touch
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) Psychic damage, and the target has the Slowed condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Anguish {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the last memory that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage and the target becomes Jinxed {@dice 1d6} (save ends).

trait.name: Digestive Enzymes
entries: The gag fly has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a {@hazard Burning|XPHB} target.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The gag fly can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@hazard Burning|XPHB} condition ({@dice 2d4} Acid). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

reaction.name: Bloat Burst
entries: {@actTrigger} The gag fly is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} or takes damage from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. {@actResponse d}{@actSave dex} {@dc 12}, each creature in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the gag fly. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@hazard Burning|XPHB} condition ({@dice 2d4} Acid).

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The lob frog's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Poison Skin
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the lob frog hits it with a melee attack, that creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Piercing damage, and the target has the Distracted condition.

action.name: Throw Frogspawn
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 4}, range 30/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage. If the target is a creature, the egg sticks to the target's body, melding with its flesh. A creature within 5 feet of the egg can take an action to remove it, dealing 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage to the target in the process. If the egg remains attached at the end of its next turn, the target is infected with a disease and has the Sickened condition until cured by magic.

Every hour, the target makes a {@actSave con} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level (cannot be removed until cured). On Monstrous Transformation, the target dies, birthing a Lob Frog.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The maunder makes one Grasp or Bite attack against each creature within its reach, or two Eye Beam attacks.

action.name: Grasp
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}). The maunder can grapple any number of creatures.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the maunder. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) Piercing damage. A Dazed target {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the maunder is Helpless against this attack.

action.name: Eye Beam
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 6}, range 60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) Radiant damage.

bonus.name: Babble
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the maunder that can hear it. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the Dazed condition until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The reality cyst is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Unhinged Reality
entries: The reality cyst emits a 120-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of unhinged reality. A creature that starts its turn in the area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB} or have the Immobilized condition until it leaves the area. While Immobilized, the target perceives an altered and confused reality, cannot see or hear anything else, and does not realize it is stationary. It may use an action to repeat the save, ending the effect on success. On success or after the effect ends, the creature is immune to this trait for 24 hours.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The reality cyst doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Psychic Whip
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) Psychic damage, and the target has the Dazed condition until the end of the reality cyst's next turn. The reality cyst can target creatures Immobilized by Unhinged Reality even if they have {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover}.

bonus.name: Feed
entries: Each creature Immobilized by Unhinged Reality takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage. The reality cyst regains HP equal to total damage dealt, and its HP maximum increases by the same amount.

reaction.name: Fracture
entries: {@actTrigger} The reality cyst takes damage. {@actResponse d}{@dc 15} Intelligence {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}, each creature in a 60-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the reality cyst. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Addled condition (save ends).

monster.name: Sewer Thing
languages: understands Common but does not speak

trait.name: Instinctive Ambusher
entries: On its first turn in combat, if the sewer thing attacks, it can make one additional Tendril Lash as part of its Multiattack.

trait.name: Poison Absorption
entries: Whenever the sewer thing takes Poison damage, it instead regains that many HP.

trait.name: Toxic Aura
entries: A creature starting its turn within 5 feet of the sewer thing must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB} or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Poison damage.

trait.name: Unexpected Appearance
entries: If motionless at the start of combat, the sewer thing has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on its {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} roll. Creatures that have not observed it move must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation|XPHB}) check to recognize it as animate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sewer thing makes two attacks and uses Engulf.

action.name: Tendril Lash
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 30 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Reel
entries: The sewer thing pulls each {@condition Grappled|XPHB} creature up to 20 feet toward it.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The sewer thing engulfs a Medium or smaller creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it. The grapple ends. The target is {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, suffocating, and at the start of each of the sewer thing's turns must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB} or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Poison damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) Acid damage. The sewer thing can have up to four creatures engulfed at a time. An engulfed creature can escape with a successful {@dc 16} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manticore makes two Claw attacks and one Stinger attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Slashing damage. If the manticore flew at least 30 feet straight toward the target before the hit, the target is {@condition Prone|XPHB} and the manticore may make a Bite attack as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 20 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage. {@dc 15} Constitution {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}. {@actSaveFail} 24 ({@damage 7d6}) Necrotic damage. Failure by 5 or more: The target also gains one Contamination level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Wing Shards {@recharge 5}
entries: {@dc 15} Dexterity {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB}, each creature in a 20-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the manticore (flying creatures have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}). {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) Piercing damage, and if flying, the target is {@condition Prone|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Amorphous Form
entries: The skin crawler can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skin crawler makes two Claw attacks and one Bind attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) Slashing damage.

action.name: Bind
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) Bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 12}). While {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition and {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the skin crawler can't Bind another target.

bonus.name: Crush and Consume
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 12}, one creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by the skin crawler. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Bludgeoning damage, and the skin crawler regains an equal number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. If this damage kills the target, the skin crawler assumes its form. The skin crawler's game statistics are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skretch makes two attacks.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) Piercing damage.

action.name: Spittle
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 120/300 ft., one target directly underneath the skretch. {@h}15 ({@damage 6d4}) Acid damage.

action.name: Expel Waste {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 10-foot radius {@variantrule Sphere [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Sphere} directly beneath the skretch. {@actSaveFail} 20 ({@damage 8d4}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@hazard Burning|XPHB} condition ({@dice 4d4} Acid). Each time the target takes damage from this condition, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or gain one Contamination level. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: The polyp's form is constantly shifting and moving through reality in unnatural ways. Attack rolls against the polyp have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}. If the polyp takes damage, this trait ceases to function until the start of its next turn. This trait is suppressed while the polyp has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions or is otherwise unable to move.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The polyp makes two Mucus attacks.

action.name: Mucus
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Acid damage, and a 5-foot radius centered on the target is covered in acidic slime for 1 minute. A creature other than the polyp that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Acid damage, and the target has the {@hazard Burning|XPHB} condition ({@dice 3d6} Acid).

action.name: Slip Space
entries: The polyp teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 20 feet. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the polyp when it reappears. {@actSaveFail} 16 ({@damage 3d10}) Force damage. Failure by 5 or More: The target triggers an Arcane Anomaly centered on itself. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Shift Step
entries: The polyp teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

reaction.name: Confused Realities
entries: {@actTrigger} The polyp takes damage from a creature it can see within 30 feet. {@actResponse} The triggering creature is teleported to an unoccupied space the polyp can see within 30 feet of its original space. The destination must be on a surface or liquid that can support the target without the target having to squeeze.

monster.name: Warp Witch
languages: The languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The warp witch can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Balefire Lantern
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) Cold damage, and the target has the Slowed condition until the end of the warp witch's next turn.

action.name: Psychic Scream
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 13}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage, and the target has the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition (save ends).

action.name: Possession
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 13}, one Humanoid the warp witch can see within 5 feet. {@actSaveFail} The target is possessed by the Warp Witch. The witch disappears, and the target has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition and loses control of its body. The witch controls the target's body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The witch can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead. The witch retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} and {@condition Frightened|XPHB} conditions. It otherwise uses the possessed target's game statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, the witch ends it as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, or the witch is turned or forced out by an effect like the {@spell Dispel Evil and Good|XPHB} spell. When the possession ends, the witch reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. If the target succeeds on its save or the effect ends for it, it is immune to this warp witch's {@variantrule Possession|XPHB} for 24 hours.

bonus.name: Mutate Host
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 13}, one creature the warp witch is possessing. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one Contamination level and a mutation.

trait.name: Misty Camouflage
entries: The dreg has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks when taking the Hide action in any area obscured by mist or fog, including the Haze.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) Slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage. Critical {@h}{@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of Contamination.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dreg can breathe air and water.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 11}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Acid damage and the target has the {@hazard Burning|XPHB} condition ({@dice 2d4} Acid).

trait.name: No Escape
entries: When the dreg hits a creature with an Opportunity Attack, that creature's {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} becomes 0 until the end of its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Bone Blade attacks.

action.name: Bone Blade
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) Force damage, and the target has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against any creature other than the dreg until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Sentinel Strike
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature within 5 feet of the dreg takes the Disengage action or makes a melee attack roll against a target other than the dreg. {@actResponse} The dreg makes an Opportunity Attack against that creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Refracted Beam attacks.

action.name: Refracted Beam
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) Radiant damage, and the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} condition until the start of the dreg's next turn. If this attack deals a different damage type due to Refract Elements, it has additional effects:
* Acid or Fire: The target is also {@hazard Burning|XPHB} ({@dice 2d6}) of the corresponding damage type.
* Cold: The target has the Frozen {@variantrule Condition|XPHB} ({@dc 13}).
* Lightning: The target has the Shocked {@variantrule Condition|XPHB} until the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Refract Elements
entries: {@actTrigger} The dreg takes Acid, Cold, Fire, or Lightning damage. {@actResponse} The dreg gains {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to the triggering damage type, including the triggering damage, until the end of its next turn. During its next turn, its Refracted Beam attack deals damage of that damage type instead of Radiant damage.

trait.name: Displacement
entries: Attack rolls against the dreg have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB}. If it is hit by an attack roll, this trait does not apply until the end of its next turn. This trait does not apply while the dreg has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition or has a {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} of 0.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Teleport {@recharge 4}
entries: The dreg teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dreg can make one melee attack. If this attack hits, it deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dreg casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Psychic Blast attacks.

action.name: Psychic Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) Psychic damage and the dreg pushes the target 10 feet straight away from itself.

action.name: Synaptic Shock {@recharge}
entries: The dreg unleashes a storm of psychic energy in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 60 feet of it. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Intelligence saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Psychic damage and has the Dazed condition (save ends).

bonus.name: Hazewarp Hex
entries: The dreg chooses a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and one of the following conditions: Addled, Clumsy, Enfeebled, or Sickened. {@actSave cha} {@dc 13}, the targeted creature. {@actSaveFail} The target becomes cursed by the dreg for one minute or until the dreg dies or uses this ability again. While cursed in this manner, a creature becomes vulnerable to Psychic damage and gains the chosen condition (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} The target is immune to the dreg's Hazewarp Hex for 24 hours.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, this dreg can gain {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on all melee attack rolls until the start of its next turn, but attack rolls against it have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} during that time.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two attacks with its Claws.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage. Critical {@h}{@actSave con} {@dc 12}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of Contamination.

bonus.name: Bounding Leap
entries: The dreg jumps 20 feet. This movement does not count toward its total movement for the round.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The dreg can take one {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} on every turn in combat.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Gut Flail attacks.

action.name: Gut Flail
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 15 ft. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

reaction.name: Flailing Guts
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature enters a space within 15 feet of it. {@actResponse} The dreg makes one Gut Flail attack against that creature.

trait.name: Octarine Glow
entries: The dreg sheds {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} in a 15-foot radius and {@variantrule Dim Light|XPHB} for an additional 15 feet.

trait.name: Arcane Hunger
entries: The dreg has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against creatures that have one or more levels of Contamination.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes three Octarine Beam attacks.

action.name: Octarine Beam
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) Radiant damage, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of Contamination.

action.name: Wave of Contamination {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature within 30 feet. {@actSaveFail} 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Radiant damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage and gain one level of Contamination. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Normal Semblance
entries: The dreg has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Charisma ({@skill Deception|XPHB}) checks to disguise itself as, or impersonate, a humanoid creature.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) Poison damage.

action.name: Furious Ambush (Recharges on a Short Rest)
entries: The dreg makes two Dagger attacks.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: The dreg takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The dreg can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Spiny Body
entries: Any creature grappling the dreg or {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) Piercing damage at the end of that creature's turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes three Spike attacks.

action.name: Spike
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft., or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) Piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage. Critical {@h}{@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of Contamination.

trait.name: Malleable
entries: The dreg can move through a space as narrow as 6 inches wide without expending extra movement to do so.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreg makes two Tentacle Slap attacks.

action.name: Tentacle Slap
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 15 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Constricting Tentacle
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 15 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition, takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns, and the dreg can't make Constricting Tentacle attacks.

trait.name: Mutant Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the hulk to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it makes a Constitution saving throw ({@dc 5} plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB}. On a successful save, the hulk drops to 1 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB|Hit Point} instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hulk makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: The hulk moves its speed. During this movement, it can move through the spaces of Medium and smaller creatures, as well as structures made of wood or stone that are less than 1 foot thick. When the hulk enters another creature's space for the first time during this movement, it can make one Slam attack against that creature. If the target is a creature, it is subject to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} the targeted creature has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hulk makes two Slam attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with its Eye Laser.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Eye Laser
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 14}, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide {@variantrule Line [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Line}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) Force damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} If the target is a creature and this damage reduces it to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, it disintegrates into a pile of fine delerium dust.

bonus.name: Wink {@recharge 4}
entries: The hulk vanishes from the Material Plane and is transported to the Space Between Worlds. At the start of its next turn, it returns to an unoccupied space of its choice within 10 feet of the space it vanished from. If no unoccupied space is available within that range, it appears in the nearest unoccupied space (chosen at random if more than one space is equally near).

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The gargantuan regains 10 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} at the start of its turn as long as it is within the Deep Haze. The gargantuan dies only if it starts its turn with 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Misty Camouflage
entries: The gargantuan has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks to hide in any area obscured by mist or fog, including the Deep Haze of Drakkenheim.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargantuan makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 12}, reach 15 ft. {@h}40 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hurl Delerium Chunk
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 12}, range 120/300 ft. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) Bludgeoning damage and the target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition. {@hom}The delerium chunk explodes creating the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 20}, the targeted creature and each creature within 10 feet of it. {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) Necrotic damage and gain one level of Contamination. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. {@actSaveSuccessOrFail} An Arcane Anomaly occurs in the space where the delerium chunk exploded.

spellcasting.name: Invisibility
headerEntries: The hulk casts {@spell Invisibility|XPHB} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Lashing Tendrils
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 60 ft. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}). The hulk can grapple up to two creatures at once.

action.name: Belly Maw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Reel
entries: The hulk pulls each creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

trait.name: Absorption
entries: When the abomination kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead, it absorbs the corpse into its body and regains 20 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The abomination can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without expending extra movement to do so.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The abomination can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The abomination makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Large or smaller creature, the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 16}) and the abomination uses Engulf on the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} creature.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The abomination engulfs a Large or smaller creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by it. Until the grapple ends the target has the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Restrained|XPHB} conditions, is suffocating, and has {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} against attacks and other effects outside the abomination. If the abomination moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The abomination can have only one creature engulfed at a time. {@actSave con} {@dc 15}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) Bludgeoning damage. The engulfed creature repeats the save at the start of each of the abomination's turns. {@actSaveSuccess} the target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lenore makes three attacks with her Tentacle Hair.

action.name: Tentacle Hair
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 10 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) Necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave con} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target gains one level of Contamination.

bonus.name: Radiant Gaze {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 30-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d10}) Radiant damage and the target gains one level of Contamination. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only. If Lenore sees her reflection within the {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}, she gains the {@condition Blinded|XPHB} and {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} conditions for {@dice 1d6} hours.

entries: {@dc 15} Dex save in 10-ft. radius within 60 ft. Fail: 21 ({@dice 6d6}) Fire + 18 ({@dice 4d8}) Necrotic; Arcane Anomaly occurs.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@hit 6} to hit, reach 0 ft. {@h}28 ({@dice 8d6}) Piercing, or 14 ({@dice 4d6}) if {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. Grapples target ({@dc 14} escape).

entries: Dash.

entries: {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Wisdom ({@skill Perception|XPHB}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Infection (3/Day)
entries: One creature within 60 ft. is infected. At start of its turn: {@dc 14} Con save; Fail: 13 ({@dice 2d12}) Necrotic, Success: half. Three successes end disease; {@spell Lesser Restoration|XPHB} ends early.

action.name: Metastasize
entries: {@dc 14} Con save from infected creature within 15 ft. Fail: Gains Addled, Clumsy, or Enfeebled (save ends). New condition replaces old if used again. All: 9 ({@dice 2d8}) Necrotic.

bonus.name: Rampant Sickness
entries: Spreads Infection from infected target to adjacent creature.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saves vs spells and magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: One Bite, three Claws, and can use Grasping Maw or Glob Launcher.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. {@h}22 ({@dice 3d10 + 6}) Piercing; Medium/smaller target swallowed ({@condition Blinded|XPHB}, {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, suffocating). Takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) Acid + {@dc 15} Con save or gain 1 Contamination at start of each of maw vermin's turns. Up to 3 swallowed creatures. Regurgitates if takes 20+ damage from inside and fails {@dc 20} Con save. {@variantrule Dead|XPHB} maw vermin releases swallowed creatures {@condition Prone|XPHB}.

action.name: Claw

entries: {@dc 18} Str save; Fail: Pulled within 5 ft. of maw vermin.

action.name: Glob Launcher

entries: The garmyr's ranged attacks ignore half and three-quarters cover.
