entries: The garmyr has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the garmyr's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The garmyr makes two attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

bonus.name: Feast
entries: The garmyr makes a bite attack against a bloodied target.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The deep dreg can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Watery Camouflage
entries: The deep dreg has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth|XPHB}) checks to hide in any area lightly obscured by murky water or aquatic features.

trait.name: Catch of the Day (1/Turn)
entries: The deep dreg can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a {@condition prone} or {@condition restrained} creature it hits with a weapon attack.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 3}, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target has the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. A creature can take an action to free itself or another creature in a net with a successful {@dc 10} Strength check. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

trait.name: Abyssal Aura
entries: Allies within 30 feet who can see and hear the deep knight have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} and {@condition Frightened|XPHB} conditions. The deep knight can't use this trait if it is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The deep knight can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Unwavering Sentinel
entries: Creatures provoke opportunity attacks from the deep knight even if they take the Disengage action before leaving its reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep knight makes one harpoon attack and one bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target is pulled up to 20 feet toward the deep knight.

bonus.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is subjected to the following effect. {@actSave str} {@dc 14}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The deep siren casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The deep siren can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deep siren makes two storm lash attacks.

action.name: Storm Lash
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) thunder damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the deep siren.

action.name: Discordant Song (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 15}, each creature of the deep siren's choice in a 30-foot emanation originating from the deep siren. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage, and the target must roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the result from each {@dice d20} test it makes. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. It automatically succeeds after 1 minute.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The deep siren covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and shape. The illusion ends if the siren takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies. The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. A creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation|XPHB}) check to discern that the siren is disguised.

bonus.name: Misty Step
entries: The deep siren magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The creature that caused the gargoyle to animate becomes its quarry. The gargoyle knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long the quarry remains within Drakkenheim or until the gargoyle is destroyed.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the wall gargoyle is destroyed, it reforms with all of its hit points in 1 hour unless a *Disintegrate* spell is cast on its remains.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargoyle makes one bite attack and one claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bronze statue.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The creatures that caused the dragon to animate become its quarries. The dragon knows the direction and distance to its quarries as long the quarries remain within Drakkenheim or until the dragon is destroyed.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The dragon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the dragon is destroyed, it reforms with all of its hit points in 1 hour unless a *Disintegrate* spell is cast on its remains.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three rend attacks.

action.name: Rend
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

items.name: Lightning Breath
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line. {@actSaveFail} 55 ({@damage 10d10}) lightning damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

items.name: Repulsion Breath
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 30-foot cone. {@actSaveFail} The target is pushed up to 40 feet away from the dragon.

monster.name: Grasping Shadow
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but mostly just screams

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The shadow can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Spectral Grasp
entries: The shadow causes one creature it can see within 5 feet to have the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition. A target that takes an action to escape automatically ends the grapple.

action.name: Death Row
entries: The shadow moves up to its speed, pulling a creature it has {@condition grappled} with it.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Crone Songs
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody in a 60-foot emanation, choosing one of the following effects. Allies of the crone are unaffected.

action.name: Breakneck Hymn
entries: Each creature in the emanation that can hear the harpy has vulnerability to bludgeoning damage from falling until the start of the harpy's next turn.

action.name: Disarming Tune
entries: {@actSave cha} {@dc 15}, each creature in the emanation that can hear the harpy. {@actSaveFail} The target has the Weakened condition until the start of the harpy's next turn.

action.name: Mesmerizing Melody
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each creature in the emanation that can hear the harpy. {@actSaveFail} 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, and the target has the Slowed condition until the start of the harpy's next turn.

action.name: Piercing Notes
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, each creature in the emanation that can hear the harpy. {@actSaveFail} 21 ({@damage 6d6}) thunder damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Aerial Maneuver
entries: The harpy takes the Dash or Disengage action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harpy makes two attacks.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 5}, range 150/600 ft. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Aerial Maneuver
entries: The harpy takes the Dash or Disengage action.

reaction.name: Chorus
entries: {@actTrigger} The harpy is within the area of another harpy's song. {@actResponse} The harpy joins in on the song, choosing a creature within 30 feet. The target has disadvantage on its next saving throw against the song.

trait.name: Pluck
entries: The harpy doesn't need to spend extra movement to drag a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harpy makes three attacks.

action.name: Grasping Talons
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 6}, reach 5 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the harpy can't use its grasping talons on another target.

action.name: Barbed Javelin
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

bonus.name: Aerial Maneuver
entries: The harpy takes the Dash or Disengage action.

reaction.name: Chorus
entries: {@actTrigger} The harpy is within the area of another harpy's song. {@actResponse} The harpy joins in on the song, choosing a creature within 30 feet. The target has disadvantage on its next saving throw against the song.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alienist casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}, +8 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Lie Detection
entries: The alienist always knows if it hears a lie, and has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight|XPHB}) checks.

trait.name: Unmatched Intellect
entries: The alienist adds its Intelligence modifier to its initiative rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The alienist makes three mind thrust attacks.

action.name: Mind Thrust
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4}) force damage, and the target is pushed 10 feet in any horizontal direction.

action.name: Mass Manipulation {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave int} {@dc 16}, up to six creatures within 60 feet of the alienist that can see and hear it. {@actSaveFail} The target must use its reaction to move up to its speed and make a weapon attack or cast a cantrip. The alienist chooses the direction of the movement and the target of the attack or cantrip.

action.name: Nerve Gas (1/Day)
entries: The alienist creates a 10-foot-radius sphere of psychoactive fog centered on a point it can see within 60 feet. The fog spreads around corners and renders its area heavily obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it. A creature that enters the fog for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on an {@actSave int} {@dc 16} or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) psychic damage and have the {@condition incapacitated} condition until the start of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: The alienist teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet.

reaction.name: Mind Over Matter
entries: {@actTrigger} The alienist takes damage. {@actResponse} The alienist gains resistance to the triggering damage.

trait.name: Critical Condition
entries: A creature that rolls a natural 1 on a saving throw against the chemist's attacks or effects takes maximum damage from the attack or effect.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chemist makes one caustic grip attack and uses either chemical spray or explosive concoction, if available.

action.name: Caustic Grip
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}24 ({@damage 8d4 + 4}) acid damage, and the target has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape {@dc 17}). Until the grapple ends, the target has the {@condition restrained} condition and the chemist can't use caustic grip against another target. At the end of each of its turns, the target takes 24 ({@damage 8d4 + 4}) acid damage.

action.name: Chemical Spray
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 30-foot cone. {@actSaveFail} 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage (the chemist's choice). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Explosive Concoction {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 17}, each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of the chemist. {@actSaveFail} 45 ({@damage 10d8}) acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage (the chemist's choice), and the target has the burning condition ({@dice 4d6}, same damage type). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Acid Rain (1/Day)
entries: The chemist conjures a storm of acid rain in a 20-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder centered on a point it can see within 120 feet. Exposed flames in the area are doused. The area becomes difficult terrain and lightly obscured. A creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a {@actSave dex} {@dc 17} or take 30 ({@damage 12d4}) acid damage and have the {@condition prone} condition. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

bonus.name: Emergency Dose
entries: The chemist administers a restorative poultice to itself or a creature it can see within 5 feet that isn't a construct or undead. The target regains 35 ({@dice 10d6}) hit points. Once a creature benefits, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Blessed Weapons
entries: When the exorcist hits with any weapon, the weapon unleashes holy fire, causing the target to have the burning condition ({@dice 4d6} radiant; included in the attacks below).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The exorcist makes two attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of grasping ghost.

action.name: Radiant Sword
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and the target has the burning condition ({@dice 4d6} radiant).

action.name: Blessed Crossbow
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 7}, range 80/320 ft. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target has the burning condition ({@dice 4d6} radiant).

action.name: Grasping Ghost
entries: {@actSave str} {@dc 15}, one creature the exorcist can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, and the target is moved 30 feet in a horizontal direction of the exorcist's choice. At the end of this movement, the target has the immobilized condition until the end of the exorcist's next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Expel Evil (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, each celestial, fey, fiend, and undead that can see and hear the exorcist. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition frightened} and {@condition incapacitated} conditions and must move as far from the exorcist as it can on its turns. The effect lasts for 1 minute or until the target takes damage, the exorcist is {@condition incapacitated}, or the exorcist dies.

action.name: Last Rites {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 15}, one creature the exorcist can see within 60 feet that isn't a celestial or construct (fiends and undead have disadvantage). {@actSaveFail} 36 ({@damage 8d8}) radiant damage. If the target is a fiend or undead, it instead takes 64 radiant damage and is turned to ash if reduced to 0 hit points. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Spiritual Healing
entries: One creature the exorcist can see regains 35 ({@dice 10d6}) hit points. Once a creature benefits, it can't do so again until it finishes a short or long rest.

reaction.name: Negate Spell (3/Day)
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the exorcist can see within 60 feet is casting a spell. {@actResponse} If the spell is level 3 or lower, the spell fails, but any spell slots or charges aren't wasted.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mutagenist casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}, +7 to spell attacks):

trait.name: Noxious Blood
entries: When a creature hits the mutagenist with a melee attack while within 5 feet, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mutagenist makes two scalpel attacks and uses forced mutation.

action.name: Scalpel
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target has the bleeding condition ({@dice 4d6}).

action.name: Forced Mutation
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 15}, one creature the mutagenist can see within 60 feet. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, and the target gains a randomly determined mutation for 1 minute. Afterwards, any lost body parts are restored. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage only.

action.name: Transmogrifying Elixir (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The mutagenist injects itself with a transmogrifying elixir, transforming into the grotesque gargantuan stat block. It reverts to its normal form after 1 hour or if reduced to 0 hit points.

bonus.name: Anatomical Precision
entries: The mutagenist gains advantage on scalpel attacks until the start of its next turn, as long as it has not moved this turn. Its speed becomes 0 until the start of its next turn.

reaction.name: Desperate Transformation
entries: {@actTrigger} The mutagenist is reduced to 0 hit points. {@actResponse} The mutagenist uses transmogrifying elixir, if available.

trait.name: Laboratory Adaptation
entries: The pathogenist is immune to disease.

trait.name: Mutated Strains
entries: The pathogenist's attacks and effects ignore the target's resistance or immunity to poison damage, and immunity to the {@condition poisoned} condition and disease.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pathogenist makes two poison needle attacks.

action.name: Poison Needle
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is stabilized and has the {@condition poisoned} condition for 1 hour, even if it regains hit points. While {@condition poisoned}, the target has the {@condition paralyzed} condition.

action.name: Pestilent Infection {@recharge 5}
entries: The pathogenist infects one creature it can see within 30 feet with a magical disease. At the start of each of its turns, the target must make a {@actSave con} {@dc 16}. {@actSaveFail} 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, and the target gains one {@condition exhaustion} level. Third success: The disease ends.

action.name: Plague Wind (1/Day)
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 16}, each creature in a 60-foot cone. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 5d8}) poison damage plus 23 ({@damage 5d8}) necrotic damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage. If the target has 25 hit points or fewer after taking this damage, it dies and its flesh turns to ash, leaving a weathered skeleton.

bonus.name: Heightened Tolerance
entries: The pathogenist ends the {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} condition on itself.

reaction.name: Outbreak
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the pathogenist can see that is infected by its pestilent infection is reduced to 0 hit points or dies. {@actResponse} The pathogenist spreads the disease to another creature it can see within 30 feet of the infected creature.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The reanimator casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}, +9 to spell attacks):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The reanimator makes two electric jolt or necrotic blast attacks.

action.name: Electric Jolt
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage, and the target has the shocked condition until the end of the reanimator's next turn.

action.name: Necrotic Blast
entries: {@atkr m,r} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft. or range 120 ft. {@h}36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage, and the target has the weakened condition until the end of the reanimator's next turn.

action.name: Touch of Death (1/Day)
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}200 poison damage. This damage ignores resistance and immunity to poison damage and can't be reduced or prevented in any way. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points, it automatically fails death saving throws until it finishes a long rest. A Heal or {@spell Greater Restoration|XPHB} spell ends this effect early.

action.name: Reanimate {@recharge 5}
entries: The reanimator targets the corpse of one of its destroyed creations it can see within 30 feet. The target returns to life with 45 ({@dice 10d8}) hit points. The target has resistance to all damage and advantage on saving throws until the end of its next turn.

bonus.name: Creator's Command
entries: The reanimator chooses a creature it can see that was reanimated or created by it. The target can use its reaction to make an attack with advantage or move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Bodyguard
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the reanimator can see targets it with an attack or spell that targets only the reanimator. {@actResponse} The reanimator chooses one of its creations within 10 feet and switches spaces with it. The creation becomes the target instead.

monster.name: Helpful Hand
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The hand can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Finger Jab
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}. {@actSaveFail} The target has the {@condition blinded} condition until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Latch
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft. {@h}The hand attaches itself to the target. While latched, the hand cannot attack. Instead, at the start of each of the hand's turns, the latched creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage. A creature within 5 feet can take an action to detach the hand with a successful {@dc 13} Strength check. The hand can also detach itself at any time during its turn (no action required).

bonus.name: Helper
entries: The hand takes the Help action.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the skull remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary humanoid skull.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Disparaging Remarks
entries: {@actSave wis} {@dc 12}, one creature the skull can see within 10 feet. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

reaction.name: Guiding Words
entries: {@actTrigger} A creature the skull can see within 10 feet makes an ability check. {@actResponse} The target can roll {@dice 1d4} and add the result to that check.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Apex regains 20 hit points at the start of its turn. If the Apex takes necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. The Apex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The Apex's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Apex makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 10}, reach 10 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Lightning Bolt
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}, each creature in a 120-foot long, 5-foot wide line. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage, and the target has the shocked condition until the end of its next turn. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

bonus.name: Fire Blast
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 10}, range 120 ft. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) fire damage, and the target and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@actSave dex} {@dc 18}. {@actSaveFail} {@hazard Burning|XPHB} condition ({@dice 4d8} fire).

bonus.name: Cold Snap
entries: {@actSave con} {@dc 18}, one creature the Apex can see within 120 ft. {@actSaveFail} 45 ({@damage 10d8}) cold damage, and the target has the frozen condition ({@dc 18}). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

reaction.name: Rapid Adaptation
entries: {@actTrigger} The Apex takes damage that isn't necrotic or psychic. {@actResponse} The Apex gains immunity to that damage type until it is reduced to 0 hit points or finishes a short or long rest.

monster.name: Body Snatcher
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Clinging Shadows
entries: A creature in dim light or darkness has disadvantage on ability checks to escape the body snatcher's grapple. Each time a creature attempts to escape the grapple while in dim light or darkness, it takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage. If this damage reduces it to 0 hit points, it is stabilized but {@condition paralyzed} for 1 hour, even if it regains hit points.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: Takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) radiant damage if it ends its turn in sunlight, and has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks in sunlight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The body snatcher makes four Grabbing Hands attacks.

action.name: Grabbing Hands
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 10 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). The body snatcher can grapple up to four targets, one per hand.

bonus.name: Shadow Teleport
entries: Teleports up to 120 ft. to dim light or darkness, bringing along any {@condition grappled} Medium or smaller creatures. Unwilling creatures can make a {@dc 13} Charisma save to resist.

monster.name: Cerebrograft
languages: The languages of its creator; telepathy 30 ft.

trait.name: Dual Minds
entries: {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saves to avoid or end {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Two Slam attacks and Telekinetic Grip.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}23 ({@dice 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning.

action.name: Telekinetic Grip
entries: One creature or object within 120 ft. Strength {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 16} or be moved up to 30 ft. and {@condition restrained} until the start of the cerebrograft's next turn. Objects ≤300 lb. can be moved.

action.name: Psychic Crush {@recharge 5}
entries: Int {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 16}, each creature in 20-ft. emanation. {@actSaveFail} 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage and {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} (save ends). Fail by 5+: {@condition stunned} (save ends). {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Amorphous Form
entries: Can move through a 1-inch space without squeezing.

trait.name: Cold Vulnerability
entries: Cold damage causes frozen ({@dc 15}), removing some resistances/immunities and adding vulnerability to thunder.

trait.name: Elemental Reaction
entries: Taking acid, fire, lightning, poison, or necrotic changes damage type of attacks and adds secondary effects (burning, shocked, {@condition poisoned}, or healing).

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: Regains 25 hp at start of turn; shut off by cold or thunder.

trait.name: Sonic Neutralization
entries: Thunder damage removes active Elemental {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Two Chemical Spray attacks and Engulf.

action.name: Chemical Spray
entries: Melee or Ranged +9, 5 ft. or 30/120 ft. {@h}35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage (modified by Elemental {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB}).

action.name: Engulf
entries: Moves through creature space; Dex {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 17} or engulfed, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage initially and at start of each turn, {@condition restrained}, can't breathe. Escape {@dc 17} Str check.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: Can move through creatures/objects; takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if ends turn inside.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Two Electroshock attacks; can also use Hypnotize if available.

action.name: Electroshock
entries: Melee or Ranged +8, 5 ft. or 60 ft. {@h}35 ({@dice 10d6}) lightning; Con {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 16} or {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until end of psyche's next turn.

action.name: Hypnotize {@recharge 5}
entries: Wis {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 16}, creatures in 30-ft. emanation; fail: {@condition incapacitated} and immobilized (save ends).

action.name: Mental Possession
entries: Int {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 16} or psyche possesses body until body drops to 0 hp or psyche ends it; target is {@condition incapacitated} but aware.

bonus.name: Teleport
entries: Teleports to unoccupied space within 60 ft.

monster.name: Injector
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Four Syringe attacks, can replace any with Booster Dose.

action.name: Syringe
entries: Melee +10, reach 5 ft. {@h}8 ({@dice 1d4 + 6}) piercing plus one random effect: lethal injection, numbing, mind dampener, or necrosis.

action.name: Booster Dose
entries: Grants one of: adrenaline rush, inoculation, restorative fluid, or focus (once per creature per rest).

reaction.name: Unstable Tank
entries: Reduces damage to 0 and explodes, applying one Syringe or Booster Dose effect in 20-ft. radius; can't use that effect again until long rest.

trait.name: Normal Semblance
entries: {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Deception and {@skill Stealth|XPHB} to appear as ordinary Small humanoid.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Two Surgical Claw attacks.

action.name: Surgical Claw
entries: Melee +5, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@dice 2d6 + 3}) slashing, bleeding ({@dice 2d4}).

action.name: Syringe (1/Day)
entries: Melee +5, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@dice 2d6 + 3}) piercing; Con {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 11} or 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage and {@condition poisoned} + {@condition paralyzed} for 1 hour. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage, still {@condition poisoned} + {@condition paralyzed}.

action.name: Latch {@recharge 5}
entries: Move to within 5 ft. and claw attack; on hit attaches, gaining advantage and moving with target. Escape {@dc 13} Str.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

trait.name: Aquatic Camouflage
entries: {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Stealth checks to hide in aquatic terrain.

trait.name: Blood Bags
entries: Has three blood bags. Roll {@dice 1d3} to determine how many are filled.

action.name: Attach
entries: Melee +3, reach 0 ft. {@h}Attaches to target. Moves with target and doesn't attack. Can detach with 5 ft. movement or when blood bags full or target dies. A creature within 5 ft. can detach with {@dc 13} {@skill Medicine|XPHB} check. {@actSaveFail} Detached but target is bleeding ({@dice 2d4}). Failure by 5+: Still attached and target takes 8 ({@dice 2d4 + 3}) piercing.

bonus.name: Blood Drain
entries: When attached, target loses 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points, filling one empty blood bag.

bonus.name: Blood Transfusion
entries: When attached and has at least one filled blood bag, target regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points and bag is emptied.

trait.name: Hazardous Fumes
entries: Creatures starting turn within 10 ft. have burning ({@dice 4d4} acid) and slowed; burning can't be removed while in range.

trait.name: Liquid Form
entries: Can squeeze through 1-inch space; can enter hostile creature's space, dealing 10 ({@dice 4d4}) acid on entry. {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on grapple checks.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Can climb difficult surfaces.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Two Pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee +5, reach 10 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) acid damage.

trait.name: Plague Symptoms
entries: Hosts a pathogenist-created disease (coughing fits, fatigue, or shivers). Con {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 13} at start of turn; fail: 18 ({@dice 4d8}) necrotic and effect. Third success ends disease.

action.name: Festering Bite
entries: Melee +2, reach 5 ft. {@h}4 ({@dice 1d8}) piercing; Con {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 13} or infected.

action.name: Bile Spreader
entries: Con {@variantrule Save|XPHB} {@dc 13} in 15-ft. cone; fail: 9 ({@dice 2d8}) necrotic and infected, success: half damage.

Removing threads: {@dc 17} {@skill Medicine|XPHB} or {@dc 15} Str; failure deals 11 ({@dice 2d10}) slashing, failure by 5+ deals damage and doesn't remove.

action.name: Attach Limb

Controlled limbs grant benefits; uncontrolled impose harmful effects. Limb can be removed (AC 20, 20 hp, poison/psychic immune). Non-Medicine removal deals 18 ({@dice 4d8}) necrotic and bleeding ({@dice 4d4}).
